### Global Temperature Anomalies

Anomalies are calculated with respect to the 1951-1980 climatology. 

Global Temperatures are in CÂ° degrees, what we see here is the difference in temperature as a result of an application of a model to estimate the mean difference in temperatures with respect to 1951-1980 time-frame.
